p: Type 2 diabetes (T2DM, or non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus) is the most common form of diabetes. It is characterized by peripheric insulin resistance and hyperglycemia, leading to a loss of pancreatic β-cells which further exacerbates the pathology. No cure is currently available for this disease, however, various drugs capable of ameliorating the patients’ quality of life and useful to control the disease have been approved [ 89]. Studies confirmed that natural products can also be used for the prevention and/or treatment of type 2 diabetes [ 90].
